Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 5
Description: Papyrus Anastasi V; sheet 10; Hieratic text. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. 22.1-22.6 A letter to a quarryman. 22.7-23.7 I have sent thee to school, be industrious there. 23.7-23.8 A letter concerning three stelae. Unpublished small fragments apparently from this manuscript are now EA 76453.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies p.68-69; Caminos, Late Egyptian Miscellanies.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381201) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381201)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: insect attack Black ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair - lacunae
